name: Black Friday (solazdev)
description:
GMTK2019 Entry - "You wouldn't trample people on a Black Friday, would you?" "Insane amounts of fun! insane amounts of debt..."

Please note, the WebGL version has some weird issues, notably lag and lack of proper speed up. There are downloadable versions currently being built.

A Game about stashing all you can in a Black Friday. Get the desired Items and avoid all else to maximize profit! (And avoid debt)

  • Mouse Left Click - Jump
  • Space - Jump
  • Game Sales - Jump
  • Are you ready for a Miracle? - Jump
